name: Squirrel Shelter
description:
Build a shelter for yourself and your friend during the day and see if it holds up to the elements and attacks by predators during the night.

Made during GodotWildJam #49 - Theme: Unstable, Wildcards: Overgrown & Colossal Creature

Art by Brotienshake
Music and Sounds by jd brown and NAWN
Code, Game Design and VFX by Alghost

Known issues:

  • The web version is currently not playing the adaptive overworld soundtrack correctly, if you want to experience the full music download the desktop version
  • It also has issues with some of the sound effects, namely the pickup sounds
